content_lines:
# My Project

This project does amazing things.

available_instructions.rule_1: This is the content for rule 1.
available_instructions.rule_2: This is the content for rule 2.

123.title: Fix bug in data processing
123.author: dev-user-1
123.description:
This PR fixes a critical bug in the data processing module.

- Added validation for input.
- Refactored the main loop.
123.diff:
diff --git a/src/utils.py b/src/utils.py
index 6a8d7d8..e9b3a4a 100644
--- a/src/utils.py
+++ b/src/utils.py
@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@
 def helper_function():
-    print("Executing helper function.")
+    print("Executing a very helpful function indeed.")

e9b3a4a.author: dev-user-1
e9b3a4a.message: feat: Improve helper function message\n\nThis provides a more descriptive message to the user when the helper function is executed.
e9b3a4a.diff:
diff --git a/src/utils.py b/src/utils.py
index 6a8d7d8..e9b3a4a 100644
--- a/src/utils.py
+++ b/src/utils.py
@@ -1,2 +1,2 @@
 def helper_function():
-    print("Executing helper function.")
+    print("Executing a very helpful function indeed.")

6a8d7d8.author: initial-committer
6a8d7d8.diff:
diff --git a/src/utils.py b/src/utils.py
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..6a8d7d8
--- /dev/null
+++ b/src/utils.py
@@ -0,0 +1,2 @@
+def helper_function():
+    print("Executing helper function.")

abc1234.author: dev-user-2
abc1234.message:
fix: Handle authentication edge cases (#123)

Added proper validation for user authentication flows.
Fixed issue where empty tokens were accepted.
abc1234.diff:
diff --git a/src/main.py b/src/main.py
index 2a3b4c5..abc1234 100644
--- a/src/main.py
+++ b/src/main.py
@@ -3,5 +3,7 @@
 def main():
     print("Starting application...")
+    # Added authentication check
+    if not validate_auth():
+        return
     utils.helper_function()

k_001.title: NVM Usage
k_001.knowledge_to_store: Before running terminal commands that involve Node.js, it is important to run 'nvm use' to ensure the correct Node.js version is active for the project.
